root.name: One Piece Grand Battle 3
root.description: This game is not to be confused as a sequel of the game One Piece: Grand Battle. GameplayThis game includes sixteen playable characters and seven stages all based on the One Piece story up to the Skypiea Arc. Playable CharactersMonkey D. Luffy Roronoa Zoro Nami Usopp Sanji Tony Tony Chopper (with Gan Fall) Nico Robin Crocodile Mr. 2 Bon Kurei Enel Ohm Smoker (with Tashigi) Hina (with Jango Fullbody) Wiper Portgas D. Ace Shanks (with his crew)
